K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa ni rang 'byung gi ye shes mthong ba mtha' yas pa la gnas shing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123a-10: phyin ci log gi mun pa dang bral bas sgrib pa med pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123a-11: de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di dag thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123a-12: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin lta bu dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123a-16: 'du shes med par bstan pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123a-17: de bas na khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab par bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa de ni ye shes thogs pa med pa ston cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123a-19: sems can rnams kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen ba la mkhas pa yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa de ni ye shes thogs pa med pa ston cing shes pa thams cad la mkhas pa yang dag par rab tu ston pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' 'di @123b dag la mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa'i las brdzi ba med cing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang ston pa mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123b-1: mngon par shes bsgrub ba'i las des byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa'i sgo'i rdzu 'phrul yang sgrub par byed /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123b-2: bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyang sgrub par byed cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123b-3: tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i stobs bskyed pa la yang gnas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123b-5: shes rab rnam par dag pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123b-6: ye shes rnam par dag pa'i stobs bskyed pa la yang gnas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123b-7: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i stobs bskyed pa la yang gnas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123b-8: gtong ba rnam par dag pa'i stobs bskyed pa la yang gnas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123b-9: chos shes pa'i stobs bskyed pa la yang gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123b-10: byang chub sems dpa' stobs bskyed pa 'di la gnas nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123b-11: bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs bskyed pa yang 'thob par 'gyur zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123b-12: des kyang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang bsgyur bar yang 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123b-13: rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba du ma yang nyams su myong bar 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123b-14: chos kyi rnga rnam pa du ma yang brdung bar 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123b-15: seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas 'khor rnams kyang chos kyis tshim par byed par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:123b-16: sems can thams cad la yang phan par nye bar bsgrub pas gnas par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124a-0: ri'i rgyal po khor yug chen po ni sems can rnams kyis dmyal ba pa'i dri nga ba'i mi mthun pa'i @124a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124a-2: dmyal ba pa'i sgra thos pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124a-3: dmyal ba pa mthong na mi rung bas sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khor yug tu bskor nas 'dug go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124a-4: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang sems can thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i chos nye bar bsgrub par bya zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124a-5: sems can rnams chos thams cad zag pa med pa la gzud par yang bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124a-6: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig chos bstan pa 'di la shes rab kyi stobs rdo rje lta bu thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pas slob pa ni; chos zab mos nges par 'byung zhing mi dmigs par gnas la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124a-7: bdud rtsis dbang bskur bar yang 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124a-8: ji ltar bdud rtsis dbang bskur bar 'gyur zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124a-9: nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyis yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124a-12: 'chi bdag gi bdud kyi dbang du yang nye bar mi gnas la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124a-15: skyes bu dam pa de dag ni stong pa nyid kyis gnas shing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124a-16: mtshan ma med pa legs par yid la byed pas gang du yang smon par mi byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124a-17: de ltar na chos 'ga' yang skye ba yang med /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124b-0: kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi @124b 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124b-1: rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124b-2: stobs dang ldan par yang mi 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124b-4: chos thams cad ni mi dmigs pa yin pas chos cung zad kyang rlom par mi byed cing rgyags pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124b-6: snyems pa spangs nas dman pa'i sems kyis nang yang dag par shes par bya ba la rmongs pa med cing phyi yang dag par shes par bya ba la legs par yongs su shes pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124b-7: de dag ni mthong ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124b-10: rnam par shes pa'i chos rnams kyis 'phrogs par mi 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124b-11: skyes bu dam pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'o zhes gsungs pa'i de bzhin nyid /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124b-12: phyin ci ma log pa de bzhin nyid /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124b-13: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gnas pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124b-14: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124b-15: gang dag 'di lta bu la gnas pa de dag ni shes rab mtha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub par 'gyur zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124b-16: shes rab kyi stobs des kyang ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa yang khong du chud par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124b-17: dgongs pa bshad pa la yang 'jug par 'gyur ro; ;de dag gis ni chos thams cad shes par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124b-18: byang chub dang mtshams med pa yang mnyam par rtogs la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:124b-19: byang chub kyang rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125a-1: med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125a-2: mtshams med pa rnam par mi rtog pas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125a-3: byang chub rnam par mi rtog pa yang khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125a-4: de dag gis byang chub dang mtshams med pa gnyi ga dmigs su med par shes pas mtshams med pa dang mi mthun par yang mi byed /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125a-5: byang chub dang mthun pa yang mi byed de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125a-6: mtshams med pa yang mi byed /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125a-10: gang dag don gyi rnam grangs bstan pa 'di la yongs su sbyang ba byas pa de dag ni las dang rnam par smin pa la mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125a-12: de dag gi las dang rnam par smin pa med cing mnyam pa nyid du shes te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125a-13: las dang rnam par smin pa ni mnyam pa yin gyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125a-14: mi mnyam pa ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125a-15: de dag ni las dang rnam par smin par mi dmigs /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125a-17: mngon par zhen par mi byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125a-18: de ci'i phyir zhe na; de dag gi las kyi sgrib pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125a-19: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i rgyu kun nas mi ldang bar bsrabs pa'i phyir ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125a-20: de dag chos thams cad kyi sgo bstan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125a-21: gzungs kyi sgo'i chos rim par phye ba 'di la snang ba thob par yang 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125a-22: de dag chos kyi sgo rnam par dag pa 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su spyod cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125b-0: spyod pa rnam par dag pa yang rjes su thob @125b par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125b-1: de dag 'jig rten gyi chos rnams gyis khengs par yang mi 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125b-2: yid shi bar yang mi 'gyur la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125b-3: bsod nams kyi zhing yon gnas su 'gyur bar spyod cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125b-4: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mngon du bgrod par bya ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125b-6: nga ni sa brgyad pa la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu la yang yon gnas dpag tu med cing tshad med pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'di lta bu la gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125b-16: chos bstan pa 'di kun shes la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125b-17: chos ji lta ba bzhin bsgrub pa la gnas pa de dag ni yon yongs su sbyong ba bla na med pa yin pas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125b-18: de bzhin gshegs pas yon gnas mchog tu gsungs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125b-20: chos 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni phun sum tshogs pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125b-21: bsnyen bkur mi rnyed pa cung zad kyang med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125b-22: de dag phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan zhing 'jigs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125b-23: skyi bung zhes byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125b-24: skrag pa dang bral ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125b-25: de dag lus dang srog kyang yongs su btang ste nga'i chos nges par bstan pa rgya chen po 'di yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125b-26: chos gang la yang yongs su 'dzin pa med par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:125b-27: de dag seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126a-1: pos chos sgrogs par yang 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126a-2: de dag mu stegs can rnams chos dang mthun pas pham par byed par yang 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126a-3: de dag bdud sdig can sde dang bcas pa zil gyis gnon par yang 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126a-4: de dag sems can rnams sgrib pa med pa la 'dzud cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la 'god par yang 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126a-5: de dag sems can rnams lam mthun pa la 'god cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126a-6: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang mi mthun par yang mi byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126a-7: de dag sems can rnams byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyis dbugs 'byin par yang byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126a-8: de dag sems can rnams la chos kyi sbyin pa byed cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126a-9: chos rab tu khong du chud par yang byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126a-11: gang dag gzungs kyi sgo ston pa'i chos rim par phye ba 'di la bzod pa bsgrub par gnas pa de dag ni byang chub kyi phyir lung bstan zin pa dang 'dra ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126a-12: skyes bu dam pa de dag ni bdag nyid kyis bdag la lung ston la rag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126a-14: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis chos 'di thos nas 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126a-15: sh'akya'i rgyal pos bdag cag la chos 'di ni nges par gtad /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126a-16: chos kyi gleng gzhi 'di ni bshad /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126a-17: gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di la ni bkod /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126b-0: chos kyi sgo 'di la ni btsud pas de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag cag @126b la phan gdags pa'i dam pas phan btags te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa de ni bdag cag la rjes su brtse ba'i pha yin no snyam du sems shing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126b-2: nga la pha'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126b-4: de dag thams cad ni ji ltar nga de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i grangs su 'gro ba dang 'dra bar grangs su 'gro bar 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126b-5: 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo ston pa'i chos rim par phye ba gnyis pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126b-6: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bzhir rnam par gzigs nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du byas pas 'khor dar lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa mthong zhing chos bstan pa yang thos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126b-8: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126b-10: de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med pas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126b-11: rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa la ltos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de lta bu ni grangs dang bral zhing grangs med la grangs kyis dben pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:126b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dang mi 'jigs pa yang gcig pa yang ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir gcig pa yang ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127a-3: tha dad pa yang ma yin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ni de kho na nyid kyang ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127a-5: de kho na nyid ma yin pa yang ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127a-6: ngo bo nyid kyang ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127a-7: ngo bo nyid med pa yang ma yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di ltar rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs pa de lta bur khong du chud par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127a-9: gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de lta bur shes pa de dag gis kyang cung zad kyang shes pa med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127a-10: gang dag gis cung zad kyang mi shes pa de dag ni nyon mongs pa med cing len pa med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa ni yod pa dang med pa las log pa yin yang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa nam yang cung zad kyang log pa med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127a-14: chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127a-16: de lta bur mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni spobs pa mtha' yas pa la gnas par 'gyur zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127a-17: chos thams cad la snang ba thob par yang 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa dag gis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' zhing thob pa med pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa mchog gis brnyes kyang chos 'ga' yang 'dren par yang mi mdzad /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127b-0: yongs su nyams par yang mi @127b mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnas pa gang yin pa de chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin gnas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127b-3: chos kyi dbyings gnas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127b-4: chos skyon med pa nyid yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127b-6: chos thams cad ni skyon med par gyur pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127b-7: 'di ltar skyon ni yang dag pa ma yin pa las kun brtags pa yin no; ;chos thams cad ni las dang rnam par smin pa mngon par 'grub pa med pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127b-8: de'i phyir chos thams cad las med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127b-9: rnam par smin pa med pa'i sgor yang dag par 'du ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127b-10: chos rnams ni chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127b-12: rnam par smin pa yang med /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127b-14: rgyu 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam yang med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa ni rgyu tshogs pa la chos thams cad ston par yang mdzad la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127b-16: rgyu yod pa ma yin zhing rgyu'i dbang du ma gyur pa'i phyir chos thams cad rgyu med par yang brjod de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127b-17: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mi 'jigs pa'i sa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127b-18: ngas ni spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dpag tu med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i sa thugs su chud do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127b-19: mi 'jigs pa'i sa yang gang zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:127b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mi 'jigs pa gang dag rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang med na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128a-1: pa gzhan dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa ni bzhi po 'di dag yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128a-2: mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag kyang gang zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128a-3: ngas chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128a-5: thams cad gzigs pa la chos 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di na 'ga' yang nga la rtsod par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128a-6: ngas mtshan ma de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas mi 'jigs pa'i mchog brnyes te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128a-7: 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128a-8: chos 'dul ba zab mo rgya chen po tshad med pa bla na med pa 'di yang ston par mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128a-9: rab tu gsal bar mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128a-10: ngas zag pa zad par rab tu mkhyen pa la zag pa 'di dag yongs su ma zad do zhes 'di la 'ga' yang nga la rtsod par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128a-11: ngas mtshan ma de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bde bar gnas shing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128a-12: chos kyi gzhi bla na med pa bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas yang dag par bsgrubs pa 'di yang rnam par dbye bar mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128a-13: ngas chos gang nges par 'byin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128b-0: sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par byed par 'gyur bar bshad pa gang yin pa de la nges par @128b 'byin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128b-1: sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnas med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128b-4: tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na 'ga' yang nga la rgol bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128b-5: ngas mtshan ma de dag yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bde bar gnas pa'i mchog brnyes te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128b-6: 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs shing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128b-7: sems can rnams la chos kyi tshul 'di yang ston par mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128b-8: ngas chos gang dag par du gcod par 'gyur bar bshad pa de dag bsten na bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128b-12: dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na 'ga' yang nga la rtsod par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128b-13: ngas mtshan ma de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bde bar gnas pa'i mchog brnyes te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128b-14: 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs shing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128b-15: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di las phyi rol pa gzhan mu stegs can gang gis kyang rab tu ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'di yang bskor bar mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:128b-17: 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129a-0: de la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' @129a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129a-1: ni myur du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i sa thob par 'gyur zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129a-2: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchog tu yang 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129a-3: bkod pa mtha' yas; byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes nam mkha' lta bu yongs su bsgoms pa rnams kyis sgo yongs su dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa kun shes par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129a-4: sgo yongs su dag pa des chos thams cad rtogs par bya ba dang po yang thob par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129a-5: chos thams cad ni rtogs par bya ba yang ma yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129a-6: chos ni nam mkha' lta bur yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129a-7: chos la ma gtogs pa yang nam mkha'i rjes su 'jug pa med la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129a-8: nam mkha' la ma gtogs pa yang chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129a-9: nam mkha' rnam par bsgoms pas chos thams cad sgom par byed kyang nam mkha' rlom par yang mi byed /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129a-10: spros par yang mi byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129a-11: don bya ba la mkhas pa rjes su 'thob kyang chos kyi dbyings ni cung zad kyang gang nas kyang 'ong ba yang med /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129a-12: gang du yang 'gro ba med cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129a-13: yang dag par 'grub pa med pas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129a-14: chos thams cad yang dag par 'grub pa med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129a-16: 'gro ba med par yongs su rtog go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129a-17: chos thams cad la chos kyi snang ba yang gsal bar byed de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129b-0: chos kyi snang ba des kyang sems can rnams la chos kyi snang ba byed @129b par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129b-2: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129b-3: gces spras byed pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129b-5: mi 'jigs pa thob par byed par 'gyur yang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129b-6: chos 'ga' yang nyams pa dang nye bar nyams par yang mi 'gyur ba la ltos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129b-8: don rtogs par bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra bar ston /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129b-9: chos thams cad bla gab med pa dang 'dra bar ston /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129b-10: las dang bya ba dang rgyu yang bla gab med pa dang 'dra bar ston zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129b-11: chos 'di dag brjod mod kyi 'di la don ni 'ga' yang mi dmigs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129b-13: chos 'dul ba zab mo 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129b-15: rnam par 'jig pa'i chos phyin ci log la yang dag par zhugs pa'i chos can yin pas de'i phyir chos 'dul ba 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129b-16: 'jig rten gyis ni 'jig rten gyi chos shes pa yang med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129b-17: 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad ni chos ma yin pas nges par 'byung ba med pa'i chos yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:129b-18: 'jig rten gnas pa thams cad ni tha na chos su 'du shes pa la mngon par zhen na yang chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130a-0: kun tu zhen pa med na de dag ni chos thams cad la chos su mngon par zhen pa'i 'du @130a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130a-3: de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa'i chos 'dul ba dang lhan cig rtsod par byed cing rtsod par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130a-4: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin ma skyes pa ni mi shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130a-5: de dag rab tu mi shes shing mi rig pa de'i phyir chos 'dul ba zab mo mkhas pa zhib mos rab tu shes pa 'di 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun par 'gyur ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos 'dul ba zab mo lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun par gyur pa 'di yang dag par gsung ba yang med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130a-8: de bzhin gshegs pas lam thams cad nges par spang ba'i phyir rtsod pa nye bar zhi ba'i chos ston par mdzad kyang 'di la lam yang mi dmigs na lam de mi zad par 'dogs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130a-10: srid pa thams cad ces bya ba 'di ni chos dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyi tshig bla dvags yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130a-11: chos thams cad ni chos dge ba dang mi dge ba dag dang ldan par 'dogs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130a-12: de la dge ba yang stong /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130a-13: mi dge ba yang stong la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130a-14: dge ba yang rnam par dben /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130a-15: mi dge ba yang rnam par dben /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130a-16: dge ba yang mi dge ba dang mi 'dre la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130a-17: mi dge ba yang dge ba dang mi 'dre zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130a-18: dge ba dang mi dge bar mngon par zhen pa'i rgyu dang rkyen yang med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130a-19: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ni lung du ma bstan pa nyid du bstan te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-0: @130b dge ba ni yang dag par yod pa ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-1: gang dag yod pa ma yin pa de dag ni lung du ma bstan pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-2: de la ni rgyu yang med /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-3: rgyur ston pa yang med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-5: chos de lta bu khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-6: chos thams cad lung du ma bstan zhing bstan du med par bstan pa la ltos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-7: chos thams cad lung du ma bstan zhing bstan pa med pa 'di ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms kyi sgo yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-9: chos dge ba dang mi dge ba thams cad ni ji ltar snang ba bzhin du rjes su 'gro ba med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-10: de dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i sgor rjes su 'gro ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-11: gang lung du ma bstan pa'i sgo de ni sgo med pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-12: gang la sgo med pa de la ni sgor dmigs su med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-13: gang sgor dmigs su med pa de ni sgo rnam par dag pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-14: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i chos rnam par sbyong ba yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-15: sgo des de dag chos thams cad la snang ba thob nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-17: the tshom mam; yid gnyis su mi 'gyur zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-18: thogs pa med par chos shes pa la mkhas par rtogs par 'gyur ro ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-19: bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-21: 'di la byang chub sems dpas shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag pa 'dod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-22: ji ltar 'dod par bya zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:130b-23: chos thams cad nye bar len pa med pas khas mi len pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-0: shin tu yongs su btang bas gnas @131a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-1: las yang dag par 'das pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-2: chos dge ba dang mi dge ba thams cad don du mi gnyer bas 'dus byas su gtogs pa thams cad la mi lta ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-3: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad la mi lta ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-5: bla na med pa'i sa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-6: mi dmigs pa'i sa la mi gnas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-7: chos gang yang mi len mi 'dor ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-8: chos gang la yang ma zhugs /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-9: kun tu ma zhugs pa 'di ni shes rab kyi mig ces bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-10: mig rnam par dag pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-11: shin tu yongs su gtong bar byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-12: shin tu 'dor bar byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-13: len pa med par byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-14: shin tu nges par spong ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin la rtog pa 'di ni shes rab kyi mig ces bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-15: shes rab kyi mig ces bya ba ni zad pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-18: mi skye ba shes pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-19: mngon par 'du byed pa med par shes pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-22: rab tu zhi ba'i sa yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-23: 'di ni mtshams sbyor ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-24: so sor mtshams sbyor ba nye bar gcod pa yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-25: 'di ni gcod pa med cing nye bar gcod pa med par shes pa ma nyams pa yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-26: 'di ni ye shes 'chab pa med pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-27: spros pa med pa'i sa 'di lta bu ni shes rab kyi mig yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131a-28: shes rab kyi mig de dang ldan pa ni sems can rnams kyi spyod pa la byams pa chen po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131b-0: snying rje chen pos @131b zin pa'i sems bskyed pa yang 'thob par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131b-1: de sems can la dmigs pa'i sbyor bas yongs su gtugs te gnas par yang 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131b-2: chos thams cad sems can med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131b-3: srog med par yang khong du chud par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131b-4: de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131b-5: gdon mi za bar chos kyi gter bla na med pa gzungs kyi sgo rnam par sbyong ba'i chos kyi le'u rim par phye ba 'di yang yang dag par bstan par bya zhing chos kyi phyag rgya 'di yang gtad par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131b-7: gzungs kyi sgo'i chos rim par phye ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi tshul rgyun mi gcad par bya ba'i phyir /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131b-8: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131b-9: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba yin; chos kyi sgo 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rnam par spyod cing rab tu ston te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131b-12: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcun bzhugs pa thams cad kyang gzungs kyi sgo'i chos rim par phye ba 'di ston par mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:131b-14: chos kyi sgo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi chos rab tu ston pa rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ba yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132a-0: dus gsum gyi chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug par @132a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132a-2: chos kyi sgo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum rnam par dag pa kun 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132a-3: de dag la dus kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'jug la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132a-4: mi dge ba thams cad kyang 'joms par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132a-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyang rjes su 'thob par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132a-8: yid kyi las yongs su dag pa la gnas par yang 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132a-9: ye shes rnam par dag pa kun du gzung ba'i phyir sgo tshad med pa yongs su sbyong bar yang 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132a-10: chos kyi tshul dmigs su med par gyur pa la yang spyod par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132a-11: chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur yang brjod par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132a-12: shes rab rnam par dag pa kun tu bstan pa dang rab tu bstan pa'i phyir shes rab kyi snang ba chen po nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa yang ston par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132a-13: chos thams cad nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132a-14: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gyi lam rnam par dag par bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132a-15: lam rnam par dag pas byang chub ji lta ba bzhin smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bden pa mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa la yang mkhas par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132a-16: bden pa dbyer med pa bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang ston par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132b-0: don thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir chos 'di la slob pa'i byang chub @132b sems dpa' ni myur du byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs kyang rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132b-1: de byang chub las ring bar mi 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132b-2: nye bar gnas par 'gyur yang chos 'ga' dang ring ba'am; chos bstan pa 'di dang nye bar 'gyur ba cung zad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132b-3: byang chub ni chos dang chos ma yin pa gang gis kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132b-4: byang chub rnam par rig pa bya ba ma yin par shes shing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132b-5: rnam par rig pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132b-6: rnam par rig pa med par rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132b-7: chos rnams la zhi ba'i don du rnam par lta ba ni byang chub tu rtog par yang mi byed de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132b-8: zhi bas kyang zhi ba mi mthong la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132b-9: zhi ba la ma gtogs pas kyang zhi ba mi mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132b-10: cung zad kyang mi mthong yang thams cad du lta ba rnam par sbyong bar yang byed la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132b-11: cung zad kyang rnam par sbyong ba yang med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132b-12: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa'i sgo yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132b-13: sgo des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi gter mtha' yas pa yang rjes su dran par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132b-14: sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su shes par byas nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132b-15: chos kyi gter 'di yang ston par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132b-16: shes rab dang ye shes kyi las yongs su dag pa yang rjes su dran par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:132b-17: de 'dod na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133a-1: bsam pa'i smon lam la yang 'jug par 'gyur la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133a-2: smon lam rnam par dag pa la mkhas pa yang rjes su dran par 'gyur zhing myur du chos thams cad la dbang thob nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i byams pa chen po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133a-3: snying rje chen po yang kun nas 'dzin zhing mngon du gyur par byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod la mkhas pa; chos kyi snang ba tshad med cing mtha' med par ston par byed cing bdag nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi yul la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133a-6: tshad med cing dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba 'di gang gi tshig bla dvags yin zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133a-8: tshad med cing dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba ni sa'i khams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133a-13: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos thams cad tshad med pa'i phyir ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133a-16: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi sems can gyi khams tshad med pa yin yang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133a-17: sems can yod pa ma yin pas sems can cung zad kyang mi dmigs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133a-19: de bzhin du khams yod pa ma yin pas khams mi dmigs te gdags su med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133a-20: de'i phyir chos de dag thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams su yang dag par 'du ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133b-0: chu'i khams @133b ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams kyi tshul can yin la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133b-1: chos thams cad kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul can te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133b-2: de'i phyir chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa'i rnam pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133b-3: mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams la ni sgrib pa cung zad kyang med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133b-4: mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams ni sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir ma bsgribs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133b-5: mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams ni dag cing rnam par dag pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133b-6: 'di ltar chu'i khams de ni khams dang bral ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133b-7: khams yod pa ma yin pas khams de khams las yang dag par bstan pas brjod pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133b-8: brjod pa gang yin pa de ni khams kyang ma yin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133b-9: khams ma yin pas kun nas bslang ba yang ma yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133b-10: brjod pa la ni khams yod pa ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133b-11: chos thams cad ni tha snyad kyi sgo nas brjod pas de'i phyir 'di brjod du med pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133b-12: 'di ltar 'di dag la ni rjod par byed pa yang mi dmigs shing mi mngon no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133b-13: brjod pa thams cad ni brjod pa med pa yin te; 'di ltar brjod pa thams cad ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid yin cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133b-14: nam mkhar yang dag par 'du ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133b-15: sa'i khams kyang brjod du med cing brjod par nus pa ma yin la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133b-18: rlung gi khams kyang ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133b-19: nam mkha'i khams kyang ma yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:133b-20: nam mkha'i khams kyi bar du yang brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134a-0: @134a *// rnam par shes pa'i khams gang gis chos thams cad tha snyad du ston pas ston par byed pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams de yang chu'i khams lta bu ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134a-1: rnam par shes pa'i khams gang khams kyi nang du yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur ba ni med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134a-2: khams ni ldan pa yang ma yin zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134a-3: nam mkha' las rab tu byung bas rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang nam mkhar yang dag par 'du ba yin no /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134a-4: rnam par shes pa ni nang dang phyi rol dang gnyis ka'i bar na yang mi dmigs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134a-5: rnam par shes pa'i khams rkyen dang ldan par bstan pa ni ma gtogs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134a-6: rnam par shes pa'i khams ni nam mkha' gsal bas kun tu zin cing nam mkhar yang dag par 'du ba yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134a-7: gdags su med pa bstan du med pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134a-8: gang gdams su med pa de la ni 'dus byas cung zad kyang med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134a-10: chos kyi dbyings ston pas chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' dang 'dra zhing mnyam par ston par 'gyur yang chos rnams la ni dbyings ma yin pa cung zad kyang med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134a-11: chos thams cad nam mkha' bla gab med pa dang 'dra bas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ni nam mkha' lta bu'o zhes rab tu bstan te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134b-0: tshad dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos @134b thams cad rang bzhin gyis nam mkha' dang 'dra zhing mnyam pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes bstan pa yongs su dag pa gang chos 'ga' yang bskyed par yang mi byed /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134b-3: chos 'ga' yang gtod pa yang mi byed pa la ltos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos kyi tshul yongs su dag pa 'di phyin ci ma log par shes pa 'dod par bya zhing gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i ye shes rlom sems med cing lhag par rlom pa med pas chos kyi sgo brjod du med pa rnam par sbyang ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134b-5: chos thams cad shes pa rnam par sbyang ba yang bsgrub par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134b-7: 'dab chags bya'i spyod yul ci yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134b-10: spyod yul nam mkha' lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134b-11: bka' stsal pa; bkod pa mtha' yas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134b-12: nam mkha'i spyod yul yang ci yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134b-18: de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang nam mkha'i spyod yul can yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134b-19: chos rnams ni spyod yul med pa'i spyod yul can yin zhing mi dmigs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134b-20: de'i phyir chos thams cad ni spyod yul med pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134b-22: rab tu spyod pa med pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134b-23: rjes su spyod pa med pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:134b-24: chos rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni gang du yang brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135a-0: chos kyi sgo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi @135a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135a-1: rnam par shes pa nam mkha' lta bur spyod par 'gyur ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135a-2: chos kyi sgo 'di ni 'od mtha' yas pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135a-3: ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas shing mu med pas kun tu khyab kyang 'di'i 'od khyab par snang ba yang med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135a-4: de ni byang chub sems dpas kyang chos kyi sgo 'di thob nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang rnam par blta zhing 'jug rten thams cad la yang yang dag par rjes su blta'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135a-6: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi ye shes kyi rnam par shes par bya ba'i sa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135a-7: nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab kyi sa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135a-8: 'di phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi sa ni ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135a-9: chos kyi tshul brjod du med pa 'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya brjod du med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135a-10: phyag rgyar brjod cing gdags pa mi dmigs pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135a-11: de'i phyir chos thams cad ni phyag rgya med pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135a-12: phyag rgya yang dag par med pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135a-13: phyag rgya med pa'i dngos po la mkhas pa rtogs pas chos thams cad nam mkha' bla gab med pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135a-14: de dag ni phyag rgya mtshan nyid med par yang dag par ston par byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135a-15: nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid cung zad kyang med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135a-16: nam mkha' ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyang ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135a-17: brjod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-0: 'di ni nam mkha'o zhes bstan pa yang nam mkha' ni yang dag pa'i @135b tshogs kyis lus su bstan pa med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-1: nam mkha' ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin par kun shes par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-3: 'di la tshig nam mkha' lta bur shes pa rnam par dag pas gzungs kyi sgo'i phyag rgya rnam par sbyong ba'i tshig rnams bstan par bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-4: ji ltar nam mkha' la tshig kyang med /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-5: rnam par dag pa yang med pa ltar tshig 'di dag kyang de dang 'dra bar rjes su rtogs par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-6: tshig de dag kyang gang zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-16: pra bh'a ri bi sho dha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-17: ni ri ba ga la pe /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-19: sa ma ba sa ra ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-22: shang ga bi mo tsa ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-24: aa dha na bi ga ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-25: kanga ksha tshe da pa ri karma /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-30: di bya dzny'a na a'a ha ra ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-31: pra dzny'a tsukshu bi sho dha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-32: sha ly'a pa na ya ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-33: dring gi aud ta ra ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-38: aa gra pa di na ra h'a re /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-39: nir de sha pa da bi sho dha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-40: ai t'i tya n'a ga ta /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-41: pa tyud pan na bi sho dha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-42: kri ta pa ri karma bhi n'i te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-43: na t'artha aa nu ga te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-45: aa gra pa da bi sho dha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-46: pra da pra bhe dha dzny'a na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-48: nir ba se aa bh'a sa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-49: aa dh'a sa bi sho dha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-50: aa sa man tad sha di sha bya ba lo ka ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:135b-51: bi r'a ga ba da ni ra h'a re /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-1: bi shud dhi aom bha sa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-2: aa pra me ya ka ra ni aa ka la pa dharm'a dar sha ni bi sho dha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-3: bh'u t'a nr'a san dar sha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-4: aa nu bo dhi aartha bi sho dha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-5: s'a ga ra tsi da n'a nu pra be she /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-6: me ru pa ni sam sth'a ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-8: sarba lo k'a dhi pa ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-9: yad dzny'a na bi sho dha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-10: aa pra ti ha ta aa shang ga dzny'a na dha re sha ne /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-12: 'di dag ni gzungs kyi sgo'i phyag rgya rnam par sbyong pa'i tshig ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-14: kun tu ma chad nye bar ma chad pa'i tshig yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-16: tshig rnam par dag par ston pa yang med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-18: gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu gang dag theg pa chen po la zhugs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-19: tshig 'di dag la spyod par 'gyur zhing chos zab mo don du gnyer ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-20: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-21: sems can rnams kyi don byed par 'dod pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis ston pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-22: gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni mi ma yin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-23: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha de dag kyang 'gug par 'gyur zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-24: lha'i bu gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir zhugs pa de dag kyang 'gug par 'gyur ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-25: au pa sam h'a re sam ha re /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136a-27: dhri ti bi sho dha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-0: ka ly'a ni aartha nir de sha pra @136b ti bha ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-1: tsita ta ma nin bi dzny'a na bi sho dha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-2: aa dhya da ma ba ha ri dha p'a ri sho dha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-3: ga ti smri ti ma ti a'a h'a ra ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-4: gan ta gan ta ba ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-5: sa re sa ra ba ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-6: gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni lha gang dag ri'i rgyal po gangs can la gnas shing chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu rnams la chos kyi snang ba nye bar bsgrub par 'gyur ba de dag dbab pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-7: lha de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-8: ma ti bi sho dha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-9: su yu ga ta b'i rye /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-13: aa bi ki la si ni aud th'a na sam pa na ne /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-14: bi ni ta sa ma ta pa ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-15: ma ti aa gr'a nu ga ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-16: lha 'di dag ni ri'i rgyal po ti se la gnas shing chos smra ba de dag la mig rnam par dag pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-17: rna ba rnams par dag pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-18: sna rnam par dag pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-19: lce rnam par dag pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-20: lus yongs su dag pa nye bar bsgrub cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-21: dus dus su chos ston pa rnam par 'byed pa rnams la ngag gi las 'brel zhing rgyun chags pa yang ston par byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-23: bee ro tsa na ba ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-27: aa sam pra mo sha ba ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-28: ao bha sa san da ri ba ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-29: au pa sang h'a ra nir de sha ba ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:136b-30: lha 'di dag ni shing s'a la'i tshal na gnas pa dag s'a la'i tshal la nye bar bsten cing chos smra ba de dag la lus kyi las dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137a-0: yid kyi las yongs su dag pa yang @137a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137a-2: tshig dbyangs dang ldan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137a-4: dga' bar byed pa'i dbyangs kyang nye bar sgrub par byed /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137a-6: mi mthun pa med pa yang nye bar sgrub par byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137a-14: au pa sam ha ra ka ra ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137a-16: ai ha dha ra ni mu khe /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137a-20: lha 'di dag ni ri'i rgyal po gangs can gyi lho phyogs kyi ngos la gnas shing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137a-21: gang dag chos 'di la brtson par 'gyur ba'i chos smra ba de dag la gzi mdangs nye bar sgrub par byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137a-25: ra tha bi sa ra dza ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137a-26: ko'u sha ly'a nu ga te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137a-27: au p'a ya sang gri h'i te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137a-29: sh'anta pa ta bi sa ra ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137a-30: ao bha sa ya sha ba ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137a-32: lha 'di dag ni rgya mtsho chen po'i ngogs na gnas shing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137a-33: chos smra ba de dag la bsod nams nye bar sgrub par byed de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa de dag gi don du gsang sngags kyi brda 'di ston par mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137a-35: gsang sngags 'di dag ni lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-1: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-4: de ba r'a dz'a ba sha tsi ma pa ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-5: sarba aa su r'a n'a na nir gh'a ta ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-6: badzre ya su pra tishthi ta /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-7: pra mar dha no pa aa su r'a n'am/
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-8: de ba n'a dhi pa ti ma sa dha pu ra skri sto bi de bi he /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-9: sho b'a sa bha sa b'a sa dha /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-10: pu ran da ra ma h'a ke tu t'a be se /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-13: pa ba shyin t'a bid dhyam/
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-14: si ta ma h'a aa su r'e na dr'a sa ba la ba na ti bhi ta trasta di sho di sha na man bud dha sya k'i rte shye /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-15: na ma go tr'a na mah'a ya sha /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-16: de b'a pu ra smi sa gra me bud dha sha ba ta aa nud ta rang shr'a be se /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-18: na ma bud dha bi bh'a shi ta /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-19: sang kra ma tshan da si b'irya bung dha na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-21: bi dza ya so ta ta /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-22: de ba aa su r'a shtsa bi ni ta b'a na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-25: ma nu shye n'a na raksha sam bi ta yang ai ha dharm'a nir de sha ao ta ran ti su pra tishthi t'a /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-26: ni gri h'i ta tv'a ya /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-27: aa su r'a raksha sa yaksha /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-29: n'a gra ku ma bh'a na da bh'u t'a ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-31: pi sh'a ts'a d'a n'a b'a ta th'a /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-32: aa tsa l'a sth'a na pr'a ba to si /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-33: ain dra ain dra lu ra skri ta aa ti gam bh'i ra /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-34: sha na ta na tsa aa gra pu ru sha se bi ta /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-35: mu tra ban to si de b'in dra /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-36: bud dhi man ta th'a bi shu ta /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-38: ai ha s'u tra smi raksha sam bid dha hi tsa sa ha sra ne tra su mu kha aa ba sa ree ba ri par ta /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-39: au ba bhunydza sva ka karma pur pa he du smi yad kri ta ma /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:137b-42: aa tsal su pra tishthi ta /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-2: ma nu shye shu ma hi pa ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-3: pur bang ga mo si de b'a nan b'u dza na tin tsa ma nu sha /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-4: bud dha sya krid tva sad k'a r'a da /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-5: p'u dza pe shy'a ti te ba hu /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-7: bi ba ra nga dha ba na ma bha sha bha de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-8: de ba la ya sya ma dha smi ya ksho hi pa ri b'a r'a ho /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-9: pra lam ba ha ri bha hu ta baska bi shad /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-10: aa gra bha hi sa ti ma ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-11: su ra ta pa ti su ra /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-12: ta th'a pra bhu ska na dha /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-13: aa ni la tsa m'a rad tstsha ma h'a bhe gi ma h'a ska na dha ma h'a he tu su pra dhi ba ma h'a ba lam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-14: aa te yaksha ma h'a te dza /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-15: raksha na ti bha ba nan ta ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-16: ba hu yaksha pa ri b'a ro /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-17: ye na sho bh'a si b'a sa tsa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-18: ba su sarba ba ba su ta ma h'a te dza ma h'a ga ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-19: ma h'a pra ha ra no /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-20: tsye ba aa bhi nir ha ra y'a ta the ba tsa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-21: su me ru mu ra nir ta /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-23: de ba pu ra skri to /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-24: sho bha te bha ba na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-25: ao bha sam pra bha munytsa si te dza sa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-26: 'di dag ni lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dbab pa'i tshig yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-27: tshig de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-28: de la 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can gang dag byang chub la yang dag par zhugs te chos rnams yang dag par 'dzin cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-29: sems can rnams la chos yang dag par bsdu ba la mkhas pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-30: lus ngan po yi bu thu bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-31: gnod sbyin yang dag shes zhes bya //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138a-32: khro med rtsol ba med gnas te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-0: pha dang bcas @138b te rtag tu ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-1: chos 'di dag la dga' ba gang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-2: de la srung ba byed par 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-3: rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-4: 'khor dang bcas pas rtag tu ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-5: legs par bshad pa mdo sde ste; ;de la srung ba byed par 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-6: mig mi bzang zhes bya ba ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-7: rang gi 'khor bcas stobs dang ldan //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-8: tshul 'di la ni gang gnas pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-9: de dag thams cad srung bar 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-10: de bzhin rgyal po 'phags skyes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-11: gzhon bcas stobs dang ldan pa ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-13: de dag kun tu srung bar 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-17: ma h'a dza ni pra bh'u ta /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-21: aa ni la sin tu sa ha n'a na bar na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-23: tsad tva ra lo ka p'a l'a ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-27: ai ha sa man ta ha r'a th'a /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-29: sar be tsa dur di sha /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-31: 'di ni rgyal po chen bzhi 'khor dang bcas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-35: rjes su 'brang bar bcas pa rnams dbab pa'i rig pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-36: shar gyi phyogs na gnas pa yi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-37: srin bu rgyal mtshan tog dang ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-38: tog chen dang ni stobs chen mo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-39: grags pa chen po gang yin pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-40: de dag kun tu 'bebs gyur cing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-41: de dag thams cad 'khor bcas te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-42: rtag tu chos kyi sgo 'di la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:138b-43: srung bar byed cing nye bar gnas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-1: dang; ;don grub ma dang 'phrog ma'i blo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-2: 'di dag thams cad nye bar ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-3: lho yi phyogs na gnas pa yin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-4: de dag yang dag 'dir babs nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-5: gzi mdangs nye bar sgrub byed cing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-6: bsrung ba'i mchog kyang byed 'gyur par //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-7: thams cad gzigs pas nges par bstan //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-8: srin mo ral pa can dang ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-9: sdom pa dang ni sgra sgrogs dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-10: 'dres pa grags dang ldan pa gang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-11: nub kyi phyogs na gnas pa ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-12: de dag lhan cig kun babs nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-13: chos 'di'i don shes gang yin pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-14: de la chos bstan bya ba'i phyir //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-15: rtag tu srung bar byed par 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-16: sgro 'di la ni ma dad dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-17: de bzhin bden dang bden min ldan //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-18: srin mo grags chen de dag ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-19: byang gi phyogs na gnas pa ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-20: de rnams yang dag 'dir babs nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi brjid kyis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-22: mi mchog bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-23: thams cad thal mo sbyar te 'khod //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-25: de la bdud sdig can tshar bcad pa'i tshig dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-26: tshangs pa dbab pa'i tshig gang yin pa de dag bstan par bya'i /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-27: legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-28: ma tre ma tra ba te; k'a ru ni k'a ru na ba ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-33: pra mo tsa na ba ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-34: kri ta kri ta ba ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-36: aa nu ga ma ba ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139a-37: aa p'a d'a na tshe da ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-0: k'a ma pi bar @139b dza ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-1: trishna sa mud sho sha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-2: ni gri h'i ta ma ra ba lang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-3: aud t'a ra na pa ti pra tyud ta ra na ba ti au pe ksh'a nu sa hi ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-4: aa ram ba ni bi sho dha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-5: ni dar sha na aa sa mo ha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-6: ni spra pa na tsa pa ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-8: 'di dag ni bdud sdig can tshar gcad pa'i tshig yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-9: de dag gis bdud sdig can dpung dang bcas shing bzhon par bcas pas glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro; ;de la tshangs pa chen po dbab pa'i tshig gang zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-11: ma h'a sth'a na pa te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-12: sva ya kri ti stha na ma ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-13: na na ba hu bi bi dha pra tyud pa sth'a na ka ra na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-14: aa dhi ka stha na ba ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-15: shud dha sth'a na ga to /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-17: aa dhi kr'a na bi sho sha na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-18: shu bha pa ri par shu bh'a dhi mu ga ta /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-21: pra bhu ta pra bh'a ni gra he ta k'a m'a ma /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-24: 'di dag ni tshangs pa chen po dbab pa'i tshig yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-25: dbab pa'i tshig 'di dag gis tshangs pa chen po chos smra ba de dag la tshig dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-26: yi ge yongs su dag pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-27: tshangs par spyod pa shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa yongs su rdzogs pa nye bar sgrub par byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-28: bi sho dha na ba ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-29: aa na ti ma h'a ka ru ni ka /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-30: k'a m'a bha ba au s'a ta ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-32: par+ya na ta pra tyud pa sth'a na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-34: a'a la ya bi sho dha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:139b-36: ka ra ni aa na ti ma de sh'a pra tyu pa sth'a ne /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-0: 'di dag ni gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi chos snang ba'i @140a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-2: chos snang ba'i tshig de dag gis rigs kyi bu de dag la chos kyi gzhi 'di nye bar bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-4: de la lha'i dbang po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-6: lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-8: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-9: sems can gang dag mthu che ba'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-12: ma dad pa yang rung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-13: de dag gi gsang sngags kyi tshig nye bar bsgrub par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-14: des na sems can dad pa rnams ni chos ston pa 'di la mchog tu 'jug par 'gyur la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-15: sems can ma dad pa de dag kyang cang mi smra ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-18: 'gyed par yang mi 'gyur la chos kyi sgo 'di tha mal par 'jog gi gnod par bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-19: nye bar gnod par bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-20: tshang gcad pa'i phyir 'ong bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-21: de la dad cing dang ba rnams dbab pa'i tshig gang zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-22: gu ru dha re; sa tsa le /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-23: sva ti ni ra ha ra ko pi na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-27: tsita ta pa ri pag ke /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-28: tsita ta sam pra s'a dh'a ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-29: man sya ha ri sha ka ra ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-30: bi dzny'a na sya aa nu sva ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-31: aa nu dharmo n'o pe ksha ne /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-32: he tu san dang sha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-33: ta th'a aaksha ra pa da /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-34: nir de sha sho thi ga ya th'a g'a th'a /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-35: ya th'a nu ku la sam/
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-38: da tra ka len tsa ka ra ta ba bya /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140a-39: sam pra sa da n'arth'a to sa ma /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-0: @140b ya th'a nu ku lanytsa mu kha au /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-1: pa sang s'a ra yo ni sha /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-2: aa k'a sha sya bi shud dhi ya /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-4: laksha n'a l'aksha ni laksha na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-5: ba ti laksha na bi sho dha ni pra ti be dh'artha sa na da da ri /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-6: sha ni ku sha la bho tha sa ra be ha pra bi tsa ye /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-7: sa mo sa ra ni kri t'a nu rakshi saty'a ra the /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-8: sa tya na na su bi sho dhi te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-10: 'di dag ni dang ba rnams dbab pa nye bar bsgrub pa'i tshig yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-11: 'di dag gis chos smra ba de dag la 'di las ji ltar bstan pa bzhin dge ba'i rtsa ba'i don dang ldan pa nye bar sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-12: de la ma dad pa rnams tshar gcad pa'i tshig gang zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-13: ksha me ksha ma ba ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-14: mee tri pa ri karma pra tyu pa sth'a ne /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-15: ka ru na pra ti la bha /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-16: ha ti aa nu kam pa sanytsa na ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-17: sam gra ha ba tu hi ta bastu san da ri sha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-18: pa ri bar dza ni ya bar tsa ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-19: pa pa mi tra se ba ne /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-20: na ta tra de she stha ta ba bya /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-21: ya tra bi gra ha ba ra ti to /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-22: sarba gran tha pra da la la ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-23: au pa ts'a ra san da ra sha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-24: ni shar ya bi sho dha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-25: a'a da m'a nu ga me /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-26: pa ra au pa sam ha ra ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-27: ni ra mi na ni aa nu raksha pra tyu pa sth'a ne /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-29: 'di dag ni sems can ma dad cing ma dad pa rnams tshar gcad pa'i tshig yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-30: de na de dag nye bar mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:140b-31: bkod pa mtha' yas; chos dge ba la yang phyir rgol ba mang ba yin no /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141a-0: chos 'dul ba bla na med pa nyes pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ba rtsod pa'i mdud pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ba 'di la @141a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141a-3: sems can ma dad cing ma dad pa de dag klan ka btsal ba'i bsam pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141a-4: gnod sems kyi bsam pa mang po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141a-5: rnam par mtho ba tsam pa'i bsam pas nga'i drung du nye bar 'ong ba la ltos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa ni de dag gi sems kyi spyod pa dang g-yo ba mkhyen nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141a-7: ci nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan zhing rnam par rtog pa spong ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141a-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi sgo dag gis yang dag par bskul bar mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141a-10: de bzhin gshegs pas ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa yang rab tu mkhyen la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141a-11: sems yang dag par bsdu ba yang rab tu mkhyen to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141a-14: bco brgyad po gang dag la gnas she na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi nub mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141a-17: len pa ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141a-20: so sor ma brtags pa'i 'gog pa mi mnga'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141a-21: 'du shes tha dad pa mi mnga'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141b-0: sems @141b mnyam par mi bzhag pa mi mnga'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141b-2: dran pa nyams pa mi mnga'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141b-4: ting nge 'dzin nyams pa mi mnga'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141b-5: shes rab nyams pa mi mnga'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141b-6: rnam par grol ba nyams pa mi mnga'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141b-7: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba nyams pa mi mnga'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag dang ldan pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:141b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mthong ba'i stobs tshad med pa dang ldan pas sems can ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142a-0: sems can dad pa rnams chos 'dul ba 'di la ye shes rnam par dag pa thob par bya ba'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnam par @142a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142a-1: sbyong ba'i chos rim par phye ba ston pa brjod par mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhed na gzungs kyi sgo'i chos rim par phye ba tshig tu brjod pa tshad med pa ston par mdzad de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142a-4: de bzhin gshegs pas tshad med pa bstan kyang gzungs kyi sgo bstan pa'i chos the tshom thams cad gcad par byed pa 'di'i brgya'i cha nas; bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142a-7: cha tsam yang nye bar bstan par mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142a-9: chos kyi sgo 'di ni sgo tshad med pa yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142a-10: sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142a-11: sgo 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142a-13: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ci nas kyang khyed kyis chos kyi sgo tshad med cing mtha' yas pa 'di kun shes par 'gyur zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142a-14: gzungs thob par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi sgo 'di rnam grangs du mas khyed la ston par mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142a-15: aa rye aa ra ba ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142a-17: ne th'a ne ni th'a na ba ti bar to par me /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142a-18: bar te pa tshe da na k'a r'a ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142a-19: a'a k'a sha bi sho dha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142a-21: aa bi ga ta bar me /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142a-23: ni ra b'a na pa th'a bi sho dha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142a-24: bya ba ni kshi ba te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142a-25: aa nud p'a da bi ro dha ba ra me /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142a-26: sarba dzny'a nir b'a na san dar sha ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142b-0: 'di dag ni gzungs kyi sgo mngon par bsgrub pa ston pa'i chos rim par phye ba 'dir gzungs kyi sgo @142b phyag rgya rnam par sbyong ba'i tshig gi rnam grangs bstan pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142b-2: byang chub sems dpa' tshegs chung dus tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa mkhas pa yang rtogs par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142b-3: snying rje chen po dang yang nye bar 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142b-4: don gyi rjes su song ba'i blos chos thams cad nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab kyang rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142b-6: tshig 'di dag ni sman chen po yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142b-7: ma rig pa dang mi shes pa'i nad kyi mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa rnams nye bar zhi bar byed cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142b-8: rig pa dang mthun pa'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ba yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142b-9: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba dang mthun pa'i chos shes pa la mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142b-10: lha'i mig mngon par bsgrub pa rig pa dang mthun pa'i chos shes pa thob par byed pa yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142b-11: zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon du bya ba rig pa dang mthun pa phung po thams cad nges par spong bar byed pa yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142b-12: bslab pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142b-13: ye shes mthong ba bla na med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142b-14: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142b-15: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sa thob par byed pa yang yin no; ;bkod pa mtha' yas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:142b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa rgya chen po ji tsam du thabs la mkhas pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba la ltos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143a-0: @143a *// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes chen po dang ldan zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143a-1: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la shin tu gnas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143a-2: chos rin po che'i mdzod bla na med pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143a-3: bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag du mar dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bsgrubs pa 'di nges par bstan zhing rab tu phye'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143a-4: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas khyed la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos la yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143a-5: chos kyi tshul mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi sgo 'di la rab tu gnas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143a-6: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par sbyong ba'i chos rim par khye ba bstan pa 'di byin gyis rlob par mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143a-8: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143a-9: nga'i rjes su slob par 'dod pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143a-10: nga'i chos kyi tshul rjes su slob par 'dod pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos gter tshad med pa kun bzung bar 'dod pa rnams kyis chos bstan pa 'di la mngon par brtson par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143a-15: bag yod pa'i tshul can khams gsum pa thams cad la mi lta ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143a-16: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sems yid la byed pas legs par byin gyis brlabs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143a-17: gzugs la dmigs pa rnam par dag pa la mkhas par brtson pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143b-0: rnam par @143b shes pa la dmigs pa rnam par dag pa la mkhas par brtson pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143b-1: bden pa'i tshig rnam par dag pa la mkhas par brtson pa rnams kyis chos thams cad la rnam par dag pa'i ye shes 'dod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143b-2: nang rnam par dag pa'i phyir /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143b-3: chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143b-4: nang dben pa'i phyir chos thams cad dben pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143b-5: nang nye bar zhi ba'i phyir chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba'o;/
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143b-6: nang nye bar len pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad nye bar len pa med de //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143b-7: nang spong ba'i chos thams cad spong ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143b-8: nang 'gog pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'gog pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143b-9: nang 'du byed pa med pas chos thams cad 'du byed pa med pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i sgo 'di dag ni nang rnam par dag par byed par 'gyur ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143b-12: phyi rol rang bzhin gyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir gang du yang rlom par mi byed pas gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa yang kun nas 'dzin par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143b-13: nga rgyal med par yang thob par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143b-15: khong khro ba yang spong bar 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang bsngags par yang 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143b-17: sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu yang 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143b-18: dbang bla na med pa yang thob par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:143b-19: ye shes chags pa med pa bstan pa la yang dga' zhing spobs pa thob par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144a-0: phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par dag pa yang kun tu @144a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144a-2: dbus nye bar zhi bar yang rjes su dran par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144a-3: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa la brten nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144a-4: smon lam gyi khyad par yang rtogs par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144a-5: smon lam yongs su dag pa yang thob par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144a-6: chos thams cad shes pa la mkhas pa thun mong ma yin pa yang kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144a-7: tshig btsun zhing chos kyi char chen po yang 'bebs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144a-9: byang chub sems dpas smon lam gyi khyad par thob nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur zhing chos thams cad rnam par dag pa yang kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144a-10: 'di ltar chos thams cad skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144a-11: zhes bya bar chos shes pa yang mngon par bsgrub par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144a-12: 'di ltar chos 'di dag thams cad ni ma byung ba las byung ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144a-13: byung nas kyang yongs su grub par mi 'gyur gyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144a-14: grub pa kho nar 'bral bar 'gyur bas 'bral ba'i chos su yang dag par 'du zhing 'bral ba'i sgo can no zhes bya bar chos shes pa yang thob par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144a-15: bral ba ni mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid du yang dag par 'du'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144a-16: chos thams cad ni skye ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144a-17: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-0: de ltar mngon par grub pa ni mngon par zhen par @144b par yang mi byed /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-1: spros par yang mi byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-3: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos mi skye ba shes pa'i sgo la mkhas pa yongs su rtog pa'i gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-4: des na myur du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yang thob par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-5: spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang kun 'dren par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sgo sgrub pa 'di yang dag par brjod pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-7: ma byung ba las chos 'byung ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-9: byung nas 'bral ba'i don yin na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-11: chos kun dngos po med pa ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-12: nyon mongs med cing len pa med //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-13: gang la chos kyang mi rnyed pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-14: de dag ji ltar kun tu 'dzin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-15: chos kun ngo bo nyid kyis ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-16: thob pa med cing rlom pa gang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-17: de dag mtshan ma spyod pa ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-19: de yi phyir na chos rnams kun //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-20: nam mkha' lta bur rab tu gsal //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-21: nam mkha' dag ni rab gsal ba //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-22: de dag gnyi ga yod ma yin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-23: chos rnams thams cad yod min zhing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-24: med pa dang yang bral ba yin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-25: gang gis de ltar chos shes pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-26: de dag la ni gzungs skye'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-27: gang zhig mtha' med rjes rtogs shing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-28: dbus kyang rlom par mi byed pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:144b-29: de dag rlom sems bral ba ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-0: chos rnams thams cad med par @145a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-2: gang la snying po mi rnyed pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-3: de la snying po yod min na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-4: chos rnams thams cad ji lta bur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-5: yang dag tshul gyis kun tu 'dzin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-6: de ltar chos rnams rang bzhin gyis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-7: nyon mongs med par shes pa gang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-8: de dag rnams la mdor na 'dir //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-9: rnam par dag pa'i gzungs su 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-10: gang zhig chos kun mkha' 'dra zhing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-11: rtag tu bar snang lta bur yang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-12: shes rab kyis ni nges rtogs pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-13: de la gzungs kun skye bar 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-14: chos rnams thams cad ma skyes shing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-15: ma byung nyon mongs med pa yin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-16: nyon mongs med cing len med pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-18: chos kun ngo bo nyid kyis ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-19: spros pa med cing mtshan nyid med //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-20: chos kun mtshan nyid bral bas na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-21: nyon mongs med par bshad pa yin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-22: gang gis de ltar chos shes shing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-23: gang du'ang rlom par mi byed pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-24: de yis chos kun tshul bzhin du //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-26: gang gis chos kun rang bzhin gyis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-27: med de yod pa ma yin dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-28: yod pa ma yin don rtogs pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-29: de la gzungs ni nye bar skye //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-30: dpa' bo gang zhig de lta bur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-31: so sor rtog pa de la ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-32: chos rnams kun gyis mi gos shing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-33: stong par mi rlom chos kun 'dzin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-34: gang zhig mi rtag pa nyid dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-35: med don sdug bsngal nyid don du //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145a-36: 'dod chags bral bar rnam shes pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-0: @145b de la shes rab ye shes 'phel //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-1: blo gros brtan pa gang zhig gis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-2: len med mya ngan 'das don du //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-3: chos kyi tshul bzhin dul byed cing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-4: mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-5: des ni snying po med pa'i chos //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-6: nyon mongs med cing len pa med //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-7: dben zhing stong la blta dka' ba //
