K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-10: brjod pa la yang mi rlom la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-11: kun tu 'dzin pas len med pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-12: rlom sems med pa'i tshul 'di yin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-13: gang gis mtshan ma rnam bshig nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-14: mtshan ma med par rab shes shing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-15: chos rnams kun gyis spong ba yi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-17: des ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-18: bshad pa'i don 'di rnam shes shing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-19: dgongs te bstan la mkhas pa yang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-20: mnyam par rjes su rtogs par 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-21: gang gis chos kun tshad med par //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-22: tshul bzhin du ni nges rtogs pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-23: de yis tshul 'di tshad dag dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-24: bral zhing mnyam par rtogs par 'gyur; ;gang gis chos rnams ming med cing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-25: mtshan ma med par yongs rtog pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-28: tshul bzhin du ni smon lam gyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-29: khyad par yongs su rnam rtog cing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-30: smon pa yin ngo bo dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:145b-32: bstan pa de ni don gyi lugs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-2: de la chos rnams thams cad kyis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-3: tshul bzhin dogs par mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-4: gang gis shes rab chos kun gyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-5: rnam par nges pa rtogs 'gyur zhing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-6: gang zhig rnam pa med pa la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-7: 'jug pa nges pa rnams shes pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-8: des ni bstan pa 'di yi tshul //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-9: bye brag shes shing rab tu gnas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-10: sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams dang; ;mi 'jigs myur du thob par 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-11: gang zhig chos la spros med cing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-12: mnyam par yang ni mi rtog pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-13: de yis chos kun sbyor shes nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-14: 'dod chags bral ba rmongs mi 'gyur; ;gang dag 'gog dang zhi ba'i don //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-15: phung po zad par mi rlom pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-16: de dag gis ni tshul bzhin du //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-18: byams pa dang ni snying rje dag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-19: sgom par byed la rab gnas shing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-20: sems can kun la phan brtson gang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-21: de dag bla med rtogs par 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-22: sems can 'du shes rnam bral zhing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-23: sems can med pa'i chos shes gang //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-25: tshul bzhin don la spros mi byed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-26: gang gis chos 'di thos gyur nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-27: dang ba myur du thob 'gyur pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-28: de ni byams pa dang gnyis mchog /

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-31: bzang pos chos 'di thos nas ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146a-32: dga' bar byed pa de dag gis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-0: de yang @146b kun tu mnyes par byas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-1: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-2: dad pa mi phyed thob 'gyur ba'i //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-3: bzang po de dag chos 'di rnams //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-4: thos nas dga' bar byed par 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-5: gang dag bskal pa bzang po yi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-6: rgyal ba blta bar 'dod de dag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-7: tshul 'di la ni legs bslabs na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-8: rgyal ba de dag mnyes par 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-9: tshe dpag med dang gzi brjid che //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-14: zhi ba kun tu mnyes byed dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-16: des ni tshul 'di bslab par gyis //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-21: smon lam dam pa rgya che zhing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-22: gtso bo rtag tu thob gyur nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-23: byang chub rtogs par 'dod na yang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-24: chos 'di dag la sgrub par gyis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-25: mdo 'di las ni des smos pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-26: phyag rgya bla na med pa ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-27: chos kun rjod par byed pa yi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-28: gzungs su bshad pa'ang 'di yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-29: chos rnams thams cad gzungs 'di yi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-30: nang du 'dus par rab tu bshad //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-31: 'di dag nam mkha'i sgo can te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-32: mtha' yas don du legs par nges //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-33: chos 'di dag las sgo bstan pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:146b-34: sgo ni legs par brjod pa yin //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-4: chos kun 'dzin par byed pa ste //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-6: shes rab nye bar gzung bar bya //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-7: rnam grangs 'dir ni bstan pa dag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-8: sangs rgyas chos shes yang dag bya //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-9: byang chub yan lag bla na med //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-10: don gyis yang dag brjod pa yin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-11: shes rab dbye ba mkhas pa yang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-12: 'di las yang dag bstan pa yin //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-14: bla med 'di la bslab par gyis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-15: bla med tshul la mkhas pa yang; ;chos 'di las ni nges par bstan //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-16: thabs shes pa la brten nas ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-17: chos 'di rab tu bstan par gyis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-18: chos rnams kyi ni rang bzhin 'di //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-19: nye bar bstan pa bla na med; ;'di la bslabs nas bdud rtsi yi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-20: don 'di yang ni bshad par gyis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-21: mkhas pa gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-22: ye shes chags pa med 'dod pa //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-24: ngas kyang sngon chad chos 'di la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-25: bskal ba bye ba tshad med cing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-26: grangs med dag tu bslabs nas ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-27: tshul 'di zhi bar gyur pa yin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-28: ngas ni sngon chad sangs rgyas dag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-29: stong phrag mang po mnyes par byas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-30: de phyir bla na med pa'i chos //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-31: 'di kun mkhyen cing gzigs pa yin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147a-32: ngas ni khyed dang sems can gyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-0: tshad @147b gzung med cing mtha' yas pa'i //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-1: don chen byas te de las ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-3: mkhas pa gang zhig gzungs kyi sgo'i //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-4: phyag rgya 'di las tshig gcig cig /

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-7: nga yi ye shes tshad med cing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-8: mtha' yas bla na med pa ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-9: nga yi ye shes phung po des //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-10: chos 'di rab tu bshad par mdzad //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-11: shes rab ldan pa gang zhig ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-12: byang chub ched du rtogs 'dod pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-14: yang dag nyid du brtson par gyis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-15: mkhas pa gang zhig shes rab kyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-16: snang ba mang po 'dod pa des //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-17: sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur rab byas nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-18: tshul 'di dag la bslab par gyis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-19: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-21: shes rab ldan pa de yis ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-22: bstan pa 'di la bslab par gyis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-23: mi gang 'od zer mtha' yas pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-24: dgye bar 'dod cing sangs rgyas kyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-25: chos don gnyer ba gang yin des; ;'di la tshul bzhin bslab par gyis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-26: dam pa gang zhig lhar bcas pa'i //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-28: chos kun rnam par nges pa yi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-29: mdo 'di la ni bslab par gyis; ;nga yi ye shes gzhal du med //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-30: ye shes rtsom pa'ang tshad med de //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-31: sangs rgyas ye shes 'dod pa gang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-32: de yis 'di la rjes su slobs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:147b-33: sangs rgyas ye shes spros med cing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-2: thams cad rab tu ston 'dod gang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-3: de yis don 'di bslab par gyis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-4: gang zhig ye shes chags med pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-6: de dag gi ni chos 'di la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-7: bslabs nas bdud rtsi bstan par bgyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-8: gang zhig gis ni 'jig rten khams //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-9: bye brag tshad med mtha' yas pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-10: snang ba byed par 'dod pa des //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-11: bstan pa 'di la yang dag slobs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-12: sgo 'di bla na med pa ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-13: chos kun rnam par skyong ba yin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-14: mdo 'di las ni chos kun gyis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-15: rnam par dag pa rab tu bstan //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-16: kun mkhyen rkang gnyis mchog gis ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-17: bla na med pa'i mdo 'di las //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-18: shin tu rgyas pa 'dir bshad pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-19: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-20: bkod pa mtha' yas; de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i ched du chos 'di yongs su gzung ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-21: yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi tshul 'di la dad pa bskyed de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-22: chos 'di yang dag par bsdus nas glegs bam la bris te gzhag par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-24: gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos 'di thos nas dga' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-25: rab tu dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed par 'gyur ba de dag gis ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi @148b gter mtha' yas pa 'di yang thob par 'gyur la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148b-1: spobs pa phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148b-2: spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang 'dzin par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148b-3: myur du chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba yang thob par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148b-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148b-5: nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148b-6: byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148b-8: chos thams cad spros pa med pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148b-9: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par sbyong bar byed pa'i chos 'di mngon du 'gyur zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148b-10: yon tan gyi khyad par tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gzhan yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148b-12: 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la chos rim par phye ba gsum pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148b-14: de lta bas na nga'i rjes su slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas phyi ma'i dus na dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148b-15: mi dge ba'i grogs po yongs su spong ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148b-16: chos 'di dag kun tu bsrung bar gnas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148b-17: lus dang srog kyang yongs su btang ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:148b-18: gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di yang dag par gzung bar bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149a-0: ston zla 'bring po'i zla ba nyi'i dkyil 'khor skar ma rnams kyis yongs @149a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149a-1: su bskor ba ni shin tu lham me /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149a-3: de bzhin du gzungs kyi phyag rgya bstan pa rim par phye bas yang dag par bsdus pa 'di yang mdo sde thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs shing snying por 'gyur la mdzes shing brjid pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149a-4: 'di dag thams cad ni gus pa chen pos spobs pa mtha' yas pa la nges par 'byung ba yin pas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149a-5: 'di la bag yod pa'i sa 'dod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149a-6: bag yod pa'i sa ji lta bu zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149a-7: chos 'di dag la sems kyi las tshul bzhin du yongs su rtog pa'i yid la byed pas nges par sems pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149a-8: ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa la rlom sems med pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149a-9: byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa'i sa la slob par 'dod pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149a-10: chos la mkhas par mngon par brtson pas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149a-11: chos 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gus pa dang bcas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149a-12: zhe sa dang bcas par bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149a-14: byang chub yang dag par zhugs pa'i don du gnyer zhing 'dun pa rnams la rab tu bstan par bya /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149a-15: kun tu bgo bar bya zhing lung 'bog pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149a-18: don nges par bstan pa'i bar du yang chos yang dag par bgro ba la bcab pa med par chos kyi sgo ji ltar kun bzung ba bzhin mi mkhyud par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149b-0: khyed sems @149b can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa 'di dag thob par 'dod na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149b-1: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag dang mi 'bral bar bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149b-2: de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni chos gang bsgrub par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149b-3: don gang rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de cung zad kyang med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149b-4: chos kyi sgo mo 'dir ma brjod pa de ni 'ga' yang med kyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149b-6: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149b-7: bde bar bya ba'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnam par sbyong ba'i chos rim par phye ba 'di gzung zhig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149b-10: chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di gzung zhig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus 'di bdag gis bzung lags te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149b-15: chos kyi sgo 'di dang ldan pa ni chos kyi sgo tshad med pa mngon du gyur pa lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149b-19: de bzhin du gshegs pa'i mthus chos kyi sgo 'di la dad pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149b-20: chos kyi sgo 'di kun 'dzin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149b-21: bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams la chos kyi sgo mang po mngon du 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:149b-23: de'i phyir khyod kyi sa chos kyi sgo de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos mang po mdzod 'di kun gzung zhig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150a-0: @150a *// chos kyi sgo 'di bstan pas 'khor 'di'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag chos kyi snang ba chen po la gnas par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150a-1: chos kyi snang ba des sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po rnams kyi chos bstan pa yang mngon du 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150a-2: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang yang nye bar 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150a-3: smon lam gyi rgyan ji lta bu 'dod pa yang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150a-5: de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams kyi rang bzhin zab mo mtshan ma med pa dag ming dang mtshan mar brjod pas ston par mdzad pa la ltos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150a-6: chos kyi rang bzhin brjod cing lta ba rnam par dag pa sbyong bar mdzad kyang 'di la cung zad kyang ston pa med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150a-7: ston par byed pa yang 'ga' yang med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150a-9: chos kyi sgo 'di ni ye shes tshad med pa yang dag par brtson pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150a-10: chos kyi sgo 'di bstan pas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag kyang mi skye ba'i chos rab tu rtogs pa'i bzod pa skyes la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150a-11: sems can dpag tu med pa dag kyang byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150a-13: gang dag chos kyi sgo 'di la sems dang po bskyed nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150a-14: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150b-0: bskal pa grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang @150b dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150b-1: spobs pa mtha' yas pa nyid la yang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150b-2: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150b-4: 'od zer des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas; 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na gnas pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis gzungs kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i chos kyi le'u 'di thos par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150b-5: thos nas kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag gi sems can rnams kyis ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150b-7: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150b-8: de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang bde ba dang yang dag par ldan par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150b-9: lha'i me tog gi char yang bab par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150b-10: 'khor der 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad du /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150b-11: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par gyur cig ces tshig tu smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150b-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa mtha' yas kyis /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150b-13: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:150b-15: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:151a-0: spobs pa mtha' yas gzungs kyi rgyal po bstan pa @151a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:151a-1: zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:151a-2: spobs pa tshad med pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:151a-3: gzungs kyi phyag rgya sbyong ba zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:151a-4: sde snod gsum yang dag par sdud pa la mkhas pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:151a-6: 'di ni don thams cad yang dag par sdud pa la mkhas pa'i chos kyi sgo yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:151a-7: des na chos thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:151a-8: chos kyi sgo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi the tshom thams cad gcod par 'gyur ba yin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:151a-9: 'di ni nga'i rjes su ston pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:151a-10: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:151a-11: bcom ldan 'das la me tog kha dog lnga pas mngon par gtor to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:151a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:151a-13: byang chub sems de dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:151a-14: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:151a-18: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:151a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:151a-20: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya ba las /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:151a-21: sgo mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyong ba bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:151a-23: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo dhi dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-002:151a-24: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban de dpal brtsegs rakshi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
